Resume Chat-Bot

A Messenger Chat bot in which a resume will be generated based on a couple of questions asked by the bot 🤖 💬

Posted August 19, 2020 Updated May 30, 2024 1 min read

GitHub Repo

Technologies Used

Back-end

  • For handling server requests: Node.js with Express.js Framework
  • WebHook: Setuped with Facebook Messenger

Front-end

  • Resume File Type: LaTeX
  • Styling: CSS and BOOTSTRAP

Others

  • Url: Resume Builder Site
  • Facebook Page: Resume Builder Bot

Scope

  • Implement Redis & remove static variable

NOTE: Not for public use currently due to Facebook policy.
